issues_completed.title: Refactor duplicate COMPONENTS dictionary definitions
issues_completed.summary: Removed dead COMPONENTS dict from circuit_node.py. The centralization into styles/constants.py was already done; only stale dead code remained.

issues_completed.title: Optimize wire rerouting during component drag
issues_completed.summary: Added show_drag_preview() to WireGraphicsItem for straight-line preview during drag. Existing 50ms debounce already handled pathfinding deferral; this fixed the visual artifact of stale wire paths.

what_worked: Board-driven Ready queue loop is clean and predictable
Dynamic ID discovery prevents stale hardcoded values
Stop condition on empty Ready queue prevents scope creep into Backlog
Hour logging + issue comments create good audit trail
Branch naming convention (issue-N-description) makes PR traceability easy
CLAUDE.md provides clear, actionable instructions with minimal ambiguity
Debounced model/controller updates in the codebase were already well-designed

pain_points.detail: Board state, field IDs, and project context must be rediscovered every session. Each session burns ~2 minutes on boilerplate gh project queries.
pain_points.suggestion: Cache discovered IDs in a session-local file or memory file with TTL

pain_points.detail: Issues #104 and #27 are In Progress with no branch, PR, or assignee. No way to tell if another agent, human, or stale session owns them.
pain_points.suggestion: Convention: assign yourself (gh issue edit --add-assignee) when picking up. Move back to Ready if abandoned.

pain_points.detail: Issue #29 was 10 lines of dead code removal but still went through full branch/PR/board ceremony.
pain_points.suggestion: Define a clear threshold (e.g. <20 lines, single file) for push-directly-to-main path mentioned in CLAUDE.md

pain_points.issue: Manual testing gaps for UI changes
pain_points.detail: Headless pytest-qt can't verify visual behavior (e.g. wire drag preview). The escape hatch works but leaves verification incomplete.
pain_points.suggestion: Consider screenshot comparison tests or a lightweight visual smoke test harness

pain_points.detail: Issue #29 referenced circuit_design_gui.py (no longer exists) and 3 file locations that had already been consolidated. Exploration was needed to find the actual problem.
pain_points.suggestion: Periodic issue grooming to update descriptions as codebase evolves

efficiency_observations.context: Issue #50 — required exploration of drag/wire/pathfinding pipeline
Board ID discovery, branch creation, PR creation, board updates per issue
